title: What are the advantages and disadvantages of gadgets? - Quora

response.answer_text: Talking about the advantages:Using gadgets reduces human efforts and time. You can take the example of a mobile phone which connects you with your workplace or your family easily.For completing a task, you can simply rely on gadgets as they are made for that purpose. For example tracker, phones etc.By using gadgets, one may have a better experience in technology.By using the gadget, one can be considered as a smart personality.Using gadgets increases effective intelligence because you can do a task in minimum time if you are using a gadget.Disadvantages of using gadgetsDecreasing human efforts leads human to their comfort zone which increases health risk.Every coin has two faces…if you are relying on gadgets then it is risky.Many devices emit radiation which can cause Cancer.Gadgets like mobile phone causes several types of eye disease.Gadgets are therefore considered as both boon and bain for humans.
